courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Master modern web development with this comprehensive course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and deploy them to production.
courses.shortDescription: Master modern web development with React, Node.js, and MongoDB in this comprehensive bootcamp.

instructor.name: David Martinez
instructor.title: Senior Full Stack Developer at Google
instructor.bio: David is a senior full stack developer with over 8 years of experience at top tech companies. He has built scalable applications used by millions of users and is passionate about teaching modern web development best practices.

highlights: Build 5 real-world projects including an e-commerce site
Learn React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Master modern JavaScript ES6+ features
Deploy applications to cloud platforms
Get job-ready with portfolio projects

courses.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn Python programming, statistics, data visualization, and machine learning algorithms. Work with real datasets and build predictive models that solve business problems.
courses.shortDescription: Learn Python, statistics, and ML algorithms to become a data science professional.

instructor.name: Dr. Sarah Kim
instructor.title: Lead Data Scientist at Netflix
instructor.bio: Dr. Kim holds a PhD in Statistics from Stanford and has led data science teams at Netflix and Uber. She specializes in machine learning applications and has published research in top-tier journals.

highlights: Master Python for data analysis with pandas and NumPy
Learn machine learning algorithms and implementation
Create stunning visualizations with matplotlib and seaborn
Work with real-world datasets from various industries
Build and deploy ML models to production

courses.title: Digital Marketing Mastery
courses.description: Master digital marketing strategies including SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, email marketing, and paid advertising across all major platforms.
courses.shortDescription: Master SEO, social media, content marketing, and analytics for digital success.

instructor.name: Jennifer Thompson
instructor.title: Digital Marketing Director at HubSpot
instructor.bio: Jennifer has over 10 years of digital marketing experience, having led successful campaigns for Fortune 500 companies. She's a certified Google Ads and Facebook Marketing expert.

highlights: Learn SEO optimization and keyword research
Master social media marketing across all platforms
Create effective content marketing strategies
Set up and optimize Google Ads and Facebook Ads
Build comprehensive marketing funnels

courses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Create stunning user experiences with design thinking principles, modern tools, and industry best practices. Master Figma, user research, and prototyping.
courses.shortDescription: Create stunning user experiences with design thinking and modern tools.

instructor.name: Alex Chen
instructor.title: Senior UX Designer at Apple
instructor.bio: Alex is a senior UX designer at Apple with 7 years of experience designing user interfaces for mobile and web applications. He's passionate about creating accessible and delightful user experiences.

highlights: Master Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD
Learn user research and testing methodologies
Design complete mobile and web applications
Build professional design portfolios
Understand design systems and accessibility

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.description: Protect systems and data with comprehensive security training covering network security, ethical hacking, incident response, and compliance frameworks.
courses.shortDescription: Protect systems and data with comprehensive security training and ethical hacking.

instructor.name: Michael Rodriguez
instructor.title: Cybersecurity Consultant & CISSP
instructor.bio: Michael is a certified cybersecurity expert with 12 years of experience in enterprise security. He holds multiple certifications including CISSP, CEH, and CISM.

highlights: Learn network security and penetration testing
Master threat detection and incident response
Understand compliance frameworks (ISO 27001, NIST)
Practice ethical hacking techniques
Get prepared for security certifications

courses.title: Business Analytics
courses.description: Make data-driven decisions with advanced analytics skills. Learn Excel, SQL, Tableau, and statistical analysis to drive business growth.
courses.shortDescription: Make data-driven decisions with advanced analytics and visualization skills.

instructor.name: Lisa Wang
instructor.title: Senior Business Analyst at McKinsey
instructor.bio: Lisa is a senior business analyst at McKinsey & Company with expertise in data visualization and strategic analytics. She has helped Fortune 500 companies optimize their operations through data insights.

highlights: Master Excel for advanced data analysis
Learn SQL for database querying
Create compelling dashboards with Tableau
Understand statistical analysis and KPIs
Apply analytics to real business scenarios
